8BITMOVEMENT.GM-Mode_hint: When ticked only the GM is able to make changes to the walking images.
8BITMOVEMENT.activate: Activate 8bit walk style for this token.
8BITMOVEMENT.Settings-Mode_hint: With this setting on the setup of the token can be done via the token Settings
8BITMOVEMENT.Token-Mode_hint: With this setting on the setup of the token can be done via the token HUD
8BITMOVEMENT.Diagonal-Mode_hint: NOTE: For now only accessible via the token HUD mode, activate this mode for using all 8 directions, if you have the images for it...
